project_plan.name: Weather Information Fetcher
project_plan.description: Build a Python program that fetches the current weather information for a given city using a public API. The program will display the temperature, humidity, and weather conditions in the terminal.

task.name: Research and choose a suitable public API for fetching weather data
Implement function to fetch weather data for a given city
Parse the fetched weather data to extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
Implement terminal output to display the fetched weather information
Write tests for the fetching and parsing functions
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
